articles.title: Demon Hunting: Strange 67-Year-Old Particle Physics Prediction Finally Confirmed - SciTechDaily
articles.description: 67 years after its theoretical prediction by David Pines, the elusive "demon" particle, a massless and neutral entity in solids, has been detected in strontium ruthenate, underscoring the value of innovative research approaches. In 1956, theoretical physicist…
articles.content: Researchers have discovered Pines demon, a collection of electrons in a metal that behaves like a massless wave. Credit: The Grainger College of Engineering at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champ… [+5827 chars]
